required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Profile of Hypertensive Patients Aged of 75 Years and Older Seen in General Practitioner According to Their Renal Damage.

brief_summary.textblock: Describe the clinical characteristics of hypertensive patients aged of 75 years and older seen in general practitioner consultation according to their renal damage

primary_outcome.measure: Describe the clinical characteristics of hypertensive patients aged of 75 years and older seen in general practitioner consultation according to their renal damage

study_pop.textblock: The first 3 consecutive patients seen during the GP's visit with a diagnosis of Hypertension and with renal damage

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female aged 75 years or older
- With a diagnosis of Hypertension treated or not, seen in general practitioner consultation
- Who has given his/her consent to participate to the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient who participated to a clinical trial

clinical_study.keyword: Hypertensive patients aged of 75 years and older
Clinical characteristics of hypertensive patients aged of 75 years and older seen in general practitioner consultation according to their renal damage
